description: Data to be sent to the bot to fetch dynamic choices that can be displayed in the choiceset dropdown for selection

dataset.description: The dataset to be queried to get the choices

count.description: The maximum number of choices that should be sent by the bot. It can be ignored if the bot wants to send a different number.

skip.description: The number of choices to be skipped in the list of choices returned by the query. It can be ignored if the bot does not want pagination
